original_title: Lumbini Aquaria wins 2 ‘Best Exporter’ awards at Presidential Export Awards 2023
original_body_lines: Lumbini Aquaria International (Pvt) Ltd., the pioneer ornamental fish exporter in Sri Lanka, won two ‘Best Exporter’ awards in its sector at the Presidential Export Awards in respect of the Company’s export performance in 2021-22 and 2022-23.

Lumbini Aquaria is credited with exporting more than two billion ornamental fish to 26 countries since its inception in 1952, and is also a past winner of the annual export awards presented the National Chamber of Exporters of Sri Lanka (NCE).

Lumbini Aquaria Chairman Vibhu Perera said: “These awards are a testimony to the resilience and courage of the Company during the worst economic downturn witnessed in our country. Our continued success in the export market is a tribute to the passion and hard work of our 100 plus employees.”
